name: The Sage
description:
Adds a new character, The Sage (73 cards, 6 relics, 1 potion).
Adds Upgraded potions to the game.
Character neutral content: 3 colorless cards, 6 relics, 2 potions, 1 event.

A mechanic who studied about the cult of a blue bird. She learned flying a carpet and brewing potions in order to stop its rise.

______________________
LATEST UPDATE:
1 new card, 1 new potion, 2 new images, 6 cards changed, 1 relic changed.
